ThingDef.Name: USH_BacteriaSampleBase
ThingDef.description: A sample of {0} {1}. When placed in a bacteria incubator, it will grow into multiple {0} pathogen colonies that can later be harvested and used in the production of a biological arsenal.\n\nCan be obtained by using disease sampler on a pawn infected with {0} or crafted from {0} pathogens.

ThingDef.Name: USH_VirusSampleBase
ThingDef.description: A sample of {0} {1}. Can be used as fuel for virus replicator to produce valuable {0} pathogens.\n\nCan be obtained by using disease sampler on a pawn infected with {0} or crafted from {0} pathogens.

ThingDef.Name: USH_ParasiteSampleBase
ThingDef.description: A sample of {0} {1}. Can be used in production of special reproduction pills that will produce {0} pathogens after consumption.\n\nCan be obtained by using disease sampler on a pawn infected with {0} or crafted from {0} pathogens.

ThingDef.Name: USH_MechanitesSampleBase
ThingDef.description: A sample of {0} {1}. Mechanites can't be reproduced so this item can't be used to create pathogens.
